item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a software engineer based in Brooklyn.

item.title: My first Machine Learning project
item.description: I’ve always had a big interest for ML. But, the real first project I had professionally was a big one. I had to build an ML pipeline without any prior experience. First thing is understanding what problems I was solving. Initially, most of the problems were classification. I normally had a labeled dataset, using some text as a feature a label
